alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 9:08AM PST until January 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches, with local amounts to 15 inches near the mountains. * WHERE...Mazama, Winthrop, Disautel Pass, Wauconda, Brewster, Boulder Creek Road, Conconully, Omak, Chesaw Road, Bridgeport, Nespelem, Republic, Methow, Oroville, Okanogan, Twisp, Loup Loup Pass, Sherman Pass, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, and Inchelium. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Western Okanogan County
